tutorial-2: How to get unlimited keys and coins in Subway Surfers
tutorial-3: How to play Subway Surfers on PC and use WASD
sobre-historia:
Blindado is a character/nickname originally created by Gustavo Berg around mid-2018, a time when Blindado played Fortnite regularly until 2022. In early 2022, Blindado discovered a growing trend: a challenge where Subway Surfers players tried to play as long as possible without collecting coins. At first, he found the idea interesting but wasn’t motivated to try it right away.

In the following days, the challenge quickly grew in popularity, gaining worldwide attention. Still, Blindado continued to ignore it... until a Brazilian player, known as bl4ckz_br, achieved the world record for the first time.

Upon learning that a fellow countryman had reached the top, Blindado felt inspired. On July 26, 2022, he decided to attempt the challenge for the first time. His first record was 2 minutes and 7 seconds, which already placed him officially among the world’s top 500 players.

From that moment on, Blindado became addicted to the challenge. Almost every week since then, he managed to beat his own time, constantly improving and establishing himself as one of the leading names in the No Coins community.
doar-description: Every contribution keeps the lives going and shows up on screen in real time.
doar-livepix-text: If you're in Brazil, use PIX for instant donations. Click the button to open LivePix and follow the steps during the stream.
doar-paypal-text: Perfect for viewers around the world. Use PayPal to send support in your currency safely and quickly.
doar-alert: As soon as the donation is confirmed, the alert pops up live on stream. Thank you for the support!
